q: 245 to 189 to repeal health care reform. The party line vote capped a vigorous debate in which Republicans vilified the health care law and Democrats exalted it, reports CBS News Congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes . " When you order every American to buy health insurance whether they want it, need it or not, that's a government takeover of healthcare, said Nancy Pelosi Mike Pence , R-Indiana, on the floor.`` Really? Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., said she had talked with Gabrielle Giffords ' husband, astronaut Mark Kelly, Saturday night.`` She's making progress every day,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So... it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury. Veteran Indiana Congressman Mike Pence said: Any increase in the debt ceiling should be married to very real and significant reductions in spending in the short term and the long term.
